But if ye will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>, I <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H5002>myself<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that this <S%H1004>house<s%> shall become a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>.

And I will <S%H6942>prepare<s%> <S%H7843>destroyers<s%> against <S%H376>thee<s%>, every one with his <S%H3627>weapons<s%>; and they shall cut <S%H3772>down<s%> thy <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%>, and <S%H5307>cast<s%> them into the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Weep <S%H1058><s%> ye not for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, neither <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H1058>him<s%>; but weep <S%H1058>sore<s%> for him that goeth <S%H1980>away<s%>; for he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> no <S%H7200>more<s%>, nor see his <S%H4138>native<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.

But in the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither they have led him <S%H1540>captive<s%>, there shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>, and he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this land no <S%H776>more<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3808>by<s%> <S%H6664>unrighteousness<s%>, and his <S%H5944>chambers<s%> by <S%H4941>injustice<s%>; that useth his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H5647>service<s%> without <S%H2600>wages<s%>, and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> him not his <S%H6467>hire<s%>;

that <S%H559>saith<s%>, I will <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H4060>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H7304>spacious<s%> <S%H5944>chambers<s%>, and cutteth him <S%H7167>out<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%>; and it is <S%H5603>ceiled<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%>, and <S%H4886>painted<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion<s%>.

Shalt thou <S%H4427>reign<s%>, because thou strivest to <S%H8474>excel<s%> in <S%H730>cedar<s%>? Did not thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>? then it was well with <S%H2896>him<s%>.

He <S%H1777>judged<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>; then it was <S%H2896>well<s%>. Was not this to <S%H1847>know<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>? saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> are not but for thy <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>, and for <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and for <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, and for <S%H4835>violence<s%>, to do <S%H6213>it<s%>.

They shall not <S%H5594>lament<s%> for <S%H1945>him<s%>, saying Ah <S%H113>lord<s%>! <S%H1945>or<s%>, Ah his <S%H1935>glory<s%>!

He shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> with the <S%H6900>burial<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%>, <S%H5498>drawn<s%> and cast <S%H7993>forth<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, and <S%H6817>cry<s%>; and lift <S%H5414>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and <S%H6817>cry<s%> from <S%H5676>Abarim<s%>; for all thy <S%H157>lovers<s%> are <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>.

I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee in thy <S%H7962>prosperity<s%>; but thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%>. This hath been thy <S%H1870>manner<s%> from thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, that thou <S%H8085>obeyedst<s%> not my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> all thy <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and thy <S%H157>lovers<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>: surely then shalt thou be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for all thy <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>.

O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, that makest thy <S%H7077>nest<s%> in the <S%H730>cedars<s%>, how greatly to be <S%H2603>pitied<s%> shalt thou be when <S%H2256>pangs<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H2427>thee<s%>, the pain as of a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>!

Is this <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3659>Coniah<s%> a <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H5310>broken<s%> <S%H6089>vessel<s%>? is he a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein none <S%H2656>delighteth<s%>? wherefore are they cast <S%H7993>out<s%>, he and his <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and are <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which they know <S%H3045>not<s%>?
